ygData.subject: LFG, Anyone willing is welcome.
ygData.msgSnippet: Wanting to meet new poeple and make some new friends.  I would like to propose a game night on either Wens, or Thurs nights 6p to 9p eastern time.  We all
ygData.messageBody:
Wanting to meet new poeple and make some new friends. I would like
to propose a game night on either Wens, or Thurs nights 6p to 9p
eastern time. We all start new toons and only play them once a week
on game night unless you miss a night and need to make up lvs.
Any server or server type is good to me PVP, PVE, or blue , Even
blue and we follow discord. We could all play one type of toon
(beastlords or mages) or shoot for balnce or all iskar some thing
like that. Please post if you would be interested in joing we will
all be making new toons thatway we are all equal and broke.
Thnx Hogg
